item.title: What Is the Best WiFi Mesh System for Consumers?
item.category: "Wi-Fi mesh systems" , "Home networking" , "Wireless technology" , "Internet connectivity" , "Consumer electronics" , "Smart homes" , "Networking devices" , "Internet of Things (IoT)" , "Wireless routers" , "Home connectivity"
